problems.title: Smart Recursion to Iteration Converter
problems.description: Many beginners face stack overflow errors due to deep recursion. The project aims to build a system that automatically converts recursive solutions into efficient iterative versions while preserving logic. It should also suggest tail recursion optimizations.as

problems.title: Real-Time Code Performance Profiler
problems.description: Students often write code without knowing which part is slowing execution. The challenge is to design a tool that highlights “slow spots” in real-time, showing time taken by loops, functions, and I/O. It should provide hints on reducing complexity.

problems.title: Memory-Efficient Data Structure Advisor
problems.description: Choosing the wrong data structure often causes excessive memory usage. This project involves building an AI-powered advisor that suggests the most memory-efficient data structure based on the problem type and code submitted.

problems.title: Infinite Loop Detector and Fixer
problems.description: Infinite loops are a common bug in programming. The challenge is to design a system that detects potential infinite loops in code and suggests fixes like exit conditions, iteration limits, or alternative approaches.

problems.title: Automated Test Case Generator for Algorithms
problems.description: Testing algorithms manually is time-consuming. The project aims to build a system that automatically generates diverse test cases, including edge cases, based on the given problem and code.

problems.title: Graph Algorithm Visual Debugger
problems.description: Graph-based algorithms are often difficult to debug. This system would visualize the step-by-step execution of graph algorithms (DFS, BFS, Dijkstra, etc.), showing traversal order, edge relaxations, and shortest path updates.

problems.title: Adaptive Sorting Algorithm Selector
problems.description: Different sorting algorithms perform better in different cases. The project is to build an intelligent system that analyzes input data patterns and automatically selects the best sorting algorithm.

problems.title: Competitive Coding AI Hints Generator
problems.description: Instead of giving direct solutions, this tool would provide structured hints (e.g., “Try using binary search instead of linear search”) to guide students towards solving problems independently.

problems.title: Code Translation Across Languages
problems.description: Programmers often need to switch between languages (C++, Python, Java). The project involves building an AI that translates algorithms between languages while preserving logic and efficiency.

problems.title: AI Tutor for Greedy Algorithms
problems.description: Greedy algorithms confuse beginners, especially when they fail for certain cases. The project is to design an AI tutor that tests greedy approaches, explains why they fail or succeed, and guides toward correct reasoning.

problems.title: Code Complexity Analyzer
problems.description: Build a tool that analyzes source code to identify areas of high cyclomatic complexity. Provide recommendations for simplifying complex code sections.

problems.title: Data Structure Visualizer
problems.description: Create a visualization tool for common data structures (like trees, graphs, stacks, queues) to help students understand their properties and behaviors.

problems.title: Algorithm Complexity Estimator
problems.description: Design a system that estimates the time and space complexity of given algorithms, helping students learn to analyze algorithm efficiency.

problems.title: Interactive Coding Quiz Platform
problems.description: Build a platform where students can take interactive quizzes on programming concepts, receiving instant feedback and hints.

problems.title: Code Review Automation Tool
problems.description: Create a tool that automatically reviews code for common mistakes, bad practices, and potential improvements.

problems.title: Debugging Assistant Chatbot
problems.description: Develop an AI chatbot that helps students debug their code by suggesting possible error sources and fixes.

problems.title: Programming Language Syntax Highlighter
problems.description: Build a tool that highlights syntax for multiple programming languages, helping students learn correct syntax and avoid errors.

problems.title: Automated Code Formatter
problems.description: Create a tool that automatically formats code to meet specified style guidelines, improving code readability.

problems.title: Version Control System Simulator
problems.description: Build a simulator for version control systems (like Git) to help students understand versioning, branching, and merging concepts.

problems.title: API Design and Documentation Generator
problems.description: Create a tool that helps students design APIs and automatically generates documentation based on the design.

problems.title: Complex Number Visualization Tool
problems.description: Create an interactive system for visualizing operations on complex numbers in the Argand plane. Include animations for rotations and transformations.

problems.title: Matrix Multiplication Visualizer
problems.description: Build a tool to visualize the process of matrix multiplication, helping students understand the algorithm and its complexity.

problems.title: Linear Equation Solver with Steps
problems.description: Create a system that solves linear equations and shows step-by-step solutions, including graphical representations.

problems.title: Quadratic Formula Explorer
problems.description: Build an interactive tool to explore the quadratic formula, its derivation, and applications.

problems.title: Statistics Summary and Visualization Tool
problems.description: Create a tool that summarizes statistical data and provides visualizations like histograms, pie charts, and box plots.

problems.title: Calculus Problem Solver and Visualizer
problems.description: Build a system that solves calculus problems (like derivatives and integrals) and provides visualizations of the solutions.

problems.title: Discrete Mathematics Problem Solver
problems.description: Create a tool that solves problems in discrete mathematics, including logic, set theory, and combinatorics.

problems.title: Number Theory Explorer
problems.description: Build an interactive tool to explore concepts in number theory, including prime factorization, GCD, and LCM.

problems.title: Probability Distributions Visualizer
problems.description: Create a tool that visualizes common probability distributions (like normal, binomial, and Poisson) and their properties.

problems.title: Graph Plotter for Functions
problems.description: Build a tool that graphs mathematical functions and allows exploration of function properties (like roots, extrema, and asymptotes).

problems.title: Physics Simulation Engine
problems.description: Develop a physics simulation engine that accurately models and visualizes physical systems (like projectile motion, pendulums, and springs).

problems.title: Interactive Circuit Designer and Simulator
problems.description: Create a tool that allows users to design and simulate electrical circuits, with real-time feedback on circuit behavior.

problems.title: Optics Ray Tracer
problems.description: Build a ray tracing tool to simulate and visualize the behavior of light rays through optical systems (lenses, mirrors, prisms).

problems.title: Thermodynamics Properties Calculator
problems.description: Create a tool that calculates and visualizes thermodynamic properties (like pressure, volume, and temperature) for ideal gases.

problems.title: Kinematics Motion Analyzer
problems.description: Develop a tool that analyzes and visualizes motion parameters (like displacement, velocity, and acceleration) for linear and rotational motion.

problems.title: Forces and Motion Simulator
problems.description: Build a simulator that demonstrates the effects of forces on motion, allowing exploration of Newton's laws of motion.

problems.title: Spring-Mass System Simulator
problems.description: Create a simulator for spring-mass systems that visualizes oscillatory motion and allows parameter adjustments.

problems.description: Develop a tool that balances chemical reactions and provides step-by-step explanations of the balancing process.

problems.title: Molecular Structure Visualizer

problems.title: Acid-Base Titration Simulator
problems.description: Develop a simulator for acid-base titrations that visualizes the titration process and calculates concentrations.

problems.description: Create a tool that calculates and visualizes thermochemical properties, including enthalpy, entropy, and Gibbs free energy.

problems.title: Genetic Code Translator

problems.description: Develop a platform that supports the development and testing of innovative civic technologies and solutions.

problems.title: Public Policy Simulation and Analysis Tool
problems.description: Create a tool that simulates and analyzes public policy scenarios and their potential impacts.

problems.title: Social Entrepreneurship Business Model Generator
problems.description: Build a tool that generates business models for social entrepreneurship ventures, focusing on sustainability and impact.

problems.title: Community Resilience Simulation Tool
problems.description: Develop a simulator that models and analyzes community resilience to social, economic, and environmental changes.

problems.title: Civic Data Collaborative Platform
problems.description: Create a platform that facilitates collaboration and data sharing between citizens, government, and organizations.

problems.title: Participatory Budgeting Tool
problems.description: Build a tool that supports participatory budgeting processes, allowing citizens to propose and vote on budget allocations.

problems.title: Social Impact Assessment Tool
problems.description: Develop a tool that assesses and visualizes the social impact of projects and policies.

problems.title: Legal Case Outcome Predictor
problems.description: Create a tool that predicts the outcomes of legal cases based on historical data and case characteristics.

problems.title: Contract Analysis and Review Tool
problems.description: Develop a tool that analyzes and reviews contracts for potential issues and suggests improvements.

problems.title: Intellectual Property Management Tool
problems.description: Create a tool that helps manage intellectual property assets, including patents, trademarks, and copyrights.

problems.title: Legal Research Assistant
problems.description: Build an AI-powered assistant that helps with legal research, including case law, statutes, and regulations.

problems.title: Courtroom Simulation and Training Tool
problems.description: Develop a simulator for courtroom procedures and trials, including role-playing and feedback features.
